name: A Cold Day in Hell
description:
A cold day in hell follows the first chapter of a Detective Story of the infamous Seattle Detective Jack Ruger and his ever growing obsession with Johnny "Two Fingers" Mallone and the Seattle Six.

Developer Notes:

1. This only goes over the first chapter of the game and doesn't really go into the full story of the "Seattle Six" at this time. 

2. No Images or music has been put into this at the moment.

3. Didn't get to add in any type of battle with the Seattle Six, but I plan on working further with this project on my own time.

As always thank you for playing, please leave a comment about anything you liked or disliked about the game.
